WorkItem.ClosedComment: I believe all issues reported here have been resolved for next release. Please open a new issue if you notice anything else or if something is not fixed after the new version is deployed.
WorkItem.Description:
For some reason I can't get RAWR to load character's from armory. And when I try to create a "New" sheet the items will not load in their respective slots for gear.
 
I go to: File -> Load Character From Armory and it stays loading for 30 minutes (I waited 30).
 
Then I clicked on US, typed in Garrosh, then Character: "Sol"
 
In the loading box it says: " [InvalidCrossThreadAcess] "
 
This is the error that comes with it: See attched "Picture 2.png" file.
 
When I go to File -> New and click on an item slot I get this error:
 
And when I install Offline form the Elitiest Jerks Site and install it and load it, as soon as I open it I get this error:

WorkItem.Summary: Issue With Rawr Loading on Macbook

Comments.Message: That worked, thank you very much. Though I have to reset all caches everytime RAWR opens :( Is there a way to fix this?

Also, when I go to "Help -> Gemmings" I get this error. I know there will be a ton of em, but I don't know how to read it or understand it.

Small note: It's "Rawr", not "RAWR".  Totally unrelated, but there it is.

Just to let you know. I was able to open your toon in the offline version with no rest of cache or any other problems. I was also able to repeat the gemming Help issue but I would assume it is because most "above basic" features are not implemented yet since this is still a beta version.

Brituck, I wish I was as lucky as you. I downloded mine from the EJ Rawr page.

But that first original error always pops up whenever I open rawr. And yeah I understand it's because it's in Beta and that's np. That's why I'm posting to find out and let it be known.
